titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 233) to amend chapter 31 of title 31, United States Code, to provide for an orderly process by which the debt ceiling is increased.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 10/10/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 233 (Prescribes a process for increasing the public debt limit).
